DOC.brief_title: Comparison Nutrition Education Alone With Acupuncture Weight Loss Breast Cancer Patients Post-Chemotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity weight gain significant concern breast cancer survivor . Given adverse consequence weight gain diagnosis , continue effort identify appropriate weight management intervention aim promote overall health long term survivorship need . In study , investigator examine whether add acupuncture nutrition education program weight loss could improve short long term weight loss among breast cancer survivor post treatment chemotherapy .
DOC.criteria: Woman diagnosis breast cancer , stage I , II , III Age ≥ 18 ECOG performance status ≤ 1 Received treatment breast cancer , treatment must complete least 2 week prior enrollment trial , longer 1 year posttreatment . BMI ≥ 30 Adequate bone marrow organ function determine consenting/enrolling investigator Signed informed consent Any receptor status Participant willing able comply protocol duration study include undergoing treatment , schedule visit , examination Current chemotherapy radiation therapy . Participants study may still receive hormone Herceptin treatment . Diagnosis metastatic breast cancer Participation dietbased weight loss program ( ie . Patient currently enrol Weight Watchers , Jenny Craig , Nutrisystem , etc . ) Current use commercial natural/herbal weight loss supplement Major surgery within 1 month start study program patient must recover effect major surgery Other malignancy within past three year except adequately treat carcinoma cervix basal squamous cell carcinoma skin Personal history eat disorder Other serious , uncontrolled medical disorder , nonmalignant systemic disease , active , uncontrolled infection ( include uncontrolled HIV , Hepatitis B C ) , psychiatric disorder prohibits obtain informed consent
